global.title: Global Steam data statistic analysis -- SteamHub
global.description: SteamHub is a global data statistic community for Steam that provides real-time prices and information for developers and gamers every day.

game.title: Steam Apps -- SteamHub
game.description: SteamHub provides developers with first-hand Steam app data.

info.title: AppID: {AppID} -- {title} -- Application data information -- SteamHub
info.description: Query data using AppID: {AppID} -- {title} in SteamHub

search.title: SteamHub Search -- SteamHub Search
search.description: SteamHub Search offers a wealth of search options for deep mining by developers and users worldwide.

q.title: Search for data about {q} apps  -- SteamHub Search
q.description: Search and use app data information about {q} in SteamHub Search

item1.title: Assassin's Creed® Odyssey
item1.description: Choose your fate in Assassin's Creed® Odyssey. From outcast to living legend, embark on an odyssey to uncover the secrets of your past and change the fate of Ancient Greece.
item1.star: IGN Rating: 9.2/10 Assassin's Creed Odyssey's open-world adventure through ancient Greece is a gorgeous thrill, and the best the series has ever been.

item2.title: Shadow of the Tomb Raider
item2.description: Laura Crawford rushed all the way to save the world from the scourge of the Mayan prophecy. She will finally meet her destiny and grow into a destined tomb.
item2.star: IGN Rating: 9/10 The 'Tomb Raider Shadow' provides a powerful final chapter for Laura Crouch's trilogy of origin.

item3.title: Cities: Skylines
item3.description: Design, build and manage your city of dreams, from public service to citizenship policy, challenge yourself, from simple towns to bustling downtown.
item3.star: IGN Rating: 8.5/10 There is only one theme for 'City: Skyline', which is to build a huge, awkward city without the need to face various massacre disasters.

SteamHub is a data exchange platform for: SteamHub is a data exchange platform for games and creative communities
